title: Treacherous
description: Born into a life of privilege on Sydney’s exclusive north shore, Charli should be happy.How could she be when everyone taunts her for who she is?No one wants to date the daughter of Australia’s most notorious criminal Defense Attorney.For Charli, college should be an escape from her old life, a clean slate.But there is no escape. Her past still haunts her.Until Charli meets Nathan – the guy sent to protect her.Nathan is everything she could ever dream of, but he is hiding something.And Frankie – the mysterious guy she meets on a college chatroom.Frankie is the guy you don’t take home to meet your parents. He is also hiding a dark secret.Torn between past and present, dark and light, Charli must make a decision and the wrong one could cost her life.Will she vanquish the demons of her past in order to have a happy ever after?Love is Treacherous
author: L.L. Hunter
